VII.i.2.E.1.f
.
Processing a Name Change
When a change of name is required, use the change of address function in Share or VBMS to update the beneficiary’s name.  This should be done prior to taking any award action.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
